//如果删除这个字段，则使用默认的规则
"去广告规则":[
{"名字":"LZ",
"寻找词":"vip.lz#hd.lz",
"正则规则": [
                "#EXT-X-DISCONTINUITY\\r*\\n*#EXTINF:6.433333,[\\s\\S]*?#EXT-X-DISCONTINUITY",
                "#EXTINF.*?\\s+.*?1o.*?\\.ts\\s+"
            ]
},
{"名字":"FF",
"寻找词":"vip.ffzy#hd.ffzy",
"正则规则":["#EXT-X-DISCONTINUITY\\r*\\n*#EXTINF:6.666667,[\\s\\S]*?#EXT-X-DISCONTINUITY"]
}
],
